name: beta-hive-metastore
description: Apache Hive Metastore is the central repository of Hive metadata. It stores the metadata for Hive tables and relations.
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 1 agent node with: 0.5 CPU, 4096 MB MEM and 4096 MB Disk.
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Hive Metastore service is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/hive-metastore/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes: The DC/OS Apache Hive Metastore service is being uninstalled.
